level.text: The Mayor shall establish a TANF funded program or service for the purpose of establishing categorical eligibility.
Categorical eligibility shall be granted to all applicants with a gross income at or below 200% of the federal poverty level.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 5082 of Fiscal Year 2010 Budget Support Second Emergency Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-207, October 15, 2009, 56 DCR 8234).
For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 5082 of Fiscal Year Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-260, January 4, 2010, 57 DCR 345).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-111
level.text: For Law 18-111, see notes following ยง 4-261.01.
